name: per
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 used when expressing rates, prices, or measurements to mean "for each": The meal will cost $20 per person. The car was travelling at 70 miles per hour (70 mph). There are more cafés per square mile here than anywhere else in the country. See also
percent
More examplesFewer examplesThey cut 2p per litre off the price of unleaded petrol.It costs a staggering $50,000 per week to keep the museum open to the public.In China, the policy of one child per family was introduced to stabilize the country's population at 1.6 billion.The train sped along at over 120 miles per hour.The computer screen displays 80 characters per line.
